comment: Absolutely stay away. Very disorganized and rude. She also didn't even show up to give us our final. If you disagree with her at all she snaps at you. Not an enjoyable class at all.

I mean.... Glad it's over. It's her way or no way.  Lesson plan stressed me out. Classes are B O R I N G! Just talking about her experiences. Field Experience was great though! Keep up with due dates and do it her way and you will do fine.

I'm not one to normally rate professors bad, but she was very frustrating because not only was she very disorganized, if your opinion is different then hers, your wrong, and she'll deduct points for it too. Those who have worked around preschoolers long enough (myself included) will be frustrated with her teaching philosophies.

While Dr. Milner was somewhat disorganized, she really knows alot about preschool education. She offered help but asked you to make an appointment and come to her office.I fel I learned alot.  This is the second time I have taken Dr. Milner.

By far the most unorganized professor in the education department. I turned in the same assignment multiple times because she kept losing it. she NEVER comes to class prepared. we spent hours watching pointless youtube videos. She will NOT discuss your grades. She gives them to you and that is it! You will never know why you got points taken away.

Do not take her!!!!!!!! She is always confused and can't remember anything!!! She cannot answer any of your questions because she is so confused about everything! AND her class is boring becuase all she does is read a power point and make you make a poster about it!

She is the worst teacher I have ever had in all my years of attending school.  She is teaching an education class, and the only thing I learned was how NOT to be a teacher.  She doesn't explain assignments and claims that we have freedom to do them as we see fit and that she grades objectively, however when the time for grades comes she is HARSH!

Dr. Milner definitely knows what she's talking about.  All the students in my section must have come from low level junior colleges because they didn't like how laid back Dr. M was, and how she let us basically control the class.  She was very helpful, told us exactly what's on the tests, and a super easy grader.  Definitely take her if you can!!
